hadiths.text: It was narrated from Maimunah that he (meaning the Prophet (ﷺ)) passed by a dead sheep belonging to the freed slave woman of Maimunah, that had been given to her in charity. He said:“Why don’t they take its skin and ten it, and make us of it?” They said: “O Messenger of Allah, it is dead meat.”* He said: “It is only unlawful to eat it.”

chapter.ara-name: باب لُبْسِ جُلُودِ الْمَيْتَةِ إِذَا دُبِغَتْ
chapter.eng-name: Wearing the skins of dead animals when they have been tanned
